org.hornetq.jms.server

Interface HornetQJMSServerBundle


  • @MessageBundle(projectCode="HQ")
public interface HornetQJMSServerBundle
    Author:
    Andy Taylor 3/12/12 Logger Code 12 each message id must be 6 digits long starting with 10, the 3rd digit should be 9 so 129000 to 129999
